identification.author: V B Coen FBCS, FIDM, FIDPM, 17/04/84

validations.errorHandling:
if     oi-type = 6
              add oi-approp to j-approp
              add oi-paid   to j-paid
              add oi-deduct-amt to j-deduct

move  RRN          to WS-Post-rrn
              perform GL-Posting-Write      *>  write GL-Posting-record
              add  1  to  rrn
     end-if
*>
     if       items = 99
              perform  bl-close
              perform  bl-open
